title: Missing my Poro Icon
body: As of my post 1 week ago I am still missing my poro icon on the NA client. None of my friends have them either please help

replies.body: Gifts are not done being sent out per our current status on the [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).   There are a lot of accounts to gift, so it's going to take some time.  The goods will come!
The gifts are still being distributed, and the final date to receive them has been pushed back to the 30th as per the banner on the [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us).
